languages.text: "Владыка судна, почему вы настаиваете на том, чтобы допрашивать старца в столь плачевном состоянии? Это оскорбляет Омниссию и привилегии духовенства {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Марса{/g}!"

"Ruler of the vessel, why do you insist on interrogating an elderly soul when it is in such a miserable state? You are making a mockery of the Omnissiah's tenets and the privileges of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Mars{/g}!"
languages.original_text: "Владыка судна, почему вы настаиваете на том, чтобы допрашивать старца в столь плачевном состоянии? Это оскорбляет Омниссию и привилегии духовенства {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Марса{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: "Ruler of the vessel, why do you insist on interrogating an elderly soul when it is in such a miserable state? You are making a mockery of the Omnissiah's tenets and the privileges of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Mars{/g}!"

"Ruler of the vessel, why do you insist on interrogating an elderly soul when it is in such a miserable state? You are making a mockery of the Omnissiah's tenets and the privileges of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Mars{/g}!"

"Why do you insist on interrogating an elderly soul when it is in such a miserable state? You are making a mockery of the Omnissiah's tenets and the privileges of the Priesthood of Mars!"

"Ruler of the vessel, why do you insist on interrogating an elderly soul when it is in such a miserable state? You are making a mockery of the Omnissiah's tenets and the privileges of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Mars{/g}!"

"Ruler of the vessel, why do you insist on interrogating an elderly soul when it is in such a miserable state? You are making a mockery of the Omnissiah's tenets and the privileges of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Mars{/g}!"

"Ruler of the vessel, why do you insist on interrogating an elderly soul when it is in such a miserable state? You are making a mockery of the Omnissiah's tenets and the privileges of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Mars{/g}!"

languages.text: « Vénérable {mf|maître|maîtresse} du vaisseau, pourquoi cet acharnement à vouloir interroger une âme aussi ancienne alors qu'elle souffre déjà le martyre ? C'est un affront aux préceptes de l'Omnimessie et aux privilèges attachés au Clergé de {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Mars{/g} ! »
languages.original_text: "Ruler of the vessel, why do you insist on interrogating an elderly soul when it is in such a miserable state? You are making a mockery of the Omnissiah's tenets and the privileges of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Mars{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: « Vénérable {mf|maître|maîtresse} du vaisseau, pourquoi cet acharnement à vouloir interroger une âme aussi ancienne alors qu'elle souffre déjà le martyre ? C'est un affront aux préceptes de l'Omnimessie et aux privilèges attachés au Clergé de {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Mars{/g} ! »

languages.text: «Gobernante de la nave, ¿por qué insiste en interrogar a un alma anciana en un estado tan miserable? ¡Se está burlando de las doctrinas del Omnissiah y de los privilegios del Sacerdocio de {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Marte{/g}!».
languages.original_text: "Ruler of the vessel, why do you insist on interrogating an elderly soul when it is in such a miserable state? You are making a mockery of the Omnissiah's tenets and the privileges of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Mars{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: «Gobernante de la nave, ¿por qué insiste en interrogar a un alma anciana en un estado tan miserable? ¡Se está burlando de las doctrinas del Omnissiah y de los privilegios del Sacerdocio de {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Marte{/g}!».

languages.text: “圣船的统治者啊，这个机魂已经上了年纪，处境还这么痛苦，你为什么一定要审问它？你这是在嘲弄欧姆尼塞亚的信条，嘲弄{g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}火星{/g}祭司的特权！”
languages.original_text: "Ruler of the vessel, why do you insist on interrogating an elderly soul when it is in such a miserable state? You are making a mockery of the Omnissiah's tenets and the privileges of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Mars{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: “圣船的统治者啊，这个机魂已经上了年纪，处境还这么痛苦，你为什么一定要审问它？你这是在嘲弄欧姆尼塞亚的信条，嘲弄{g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}火星{/g}祭司的特权！”

languages.text: 「船の支配者よ、なぜ惨めな老人を尋問するのですか？あなたは、万機神の教義と{g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}火星{/g}の神官団の特権を愚弄しています！」
languages.original_text: "Ruler of the vessel, why do you insist on interrogating an elderly soul when it is in such a miserable state? You are making a mockery of the Omnissiah's tenets and the privileges of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Mars{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: 「船の支配者よ、なぜ惨めな老人を尋問するのですか？あなたは、万機神の教義と{g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}火星{/g}の神官団の特権を愚弄しています！」

languages.text: "{mf|Herrscher|Herrscherin} des Schiffs, warum besteht Ihr darauf, eine alte Seele zu verhören, wenn sie sich in einem derart schlechten Zustand befindet? Ihr gebt die Grundsätze des Omnissiah und die Privilegien der Priesterschaft des {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Mars{/g} damit der Lächerlichkeit preis!"
languages.original_text: "Ruler of the vessel, why do you insist on interrogating an elderly soul when it is in such a miserable state? You are making a mockery of the Omnissiah's tenets and the privileges of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Mars{/g}!"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Herrscher|Herrscherin} des Schiffs, warum besteht Ihr darauf, eine alte Seele zu verhören, wenn sie sich in einem derart schlechten Zustand befindet? Ihr gebt die Grundsätze des Omnissiah und die Privilegien der Priesterschaft des {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Mars{/g} damit der Lächerlichkeit preis!"

languages.text: "Bu geminin hükümdarı, böylesine perişan bir hâldeyken ihtiyar bir ruhu sorgulamak için neden diretiyorsunuz? Hermesih'in ilkeleriyle ve {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Mars{/g} Rahipliği'nin imtiyazlarıyla alay ediyorsunuz!"
languages.original_text: "Ruler of the vessel, why do you insist on interrogating an elderly soul when it is in such a miserable state? You are making a mockery of the Omnissiah's tenets and the privileges of the Priesthood of {g|Encyclopedia:MarsGlossary}Mars{/g}!"
